property.name: messageText
property.value: The Audit feature is disabled for non-students. We are unable to run a degree audit for you at this time.

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript
headerText
property.value: How to Use Degree Audit (DARS) for Academic Planning

property.name: headerText
property.value: How to Use Plan Audit for Academic Planning

property.name: messageText
property.value: Select your campus and choose a degree program or minor from the dropdown menu below. Audits may take 1-5 minutes to load. You can leave this page to browse MyPlan further while you wait.

property.name: messageText
property.value: Select your campus and intended degree program from the dropdown menu below. Plan reviews may take 1-5 minutes to load. You must have at least one course in your plan to run a plan review.

property.name: messageText
property.value: in the degree program list for audit.

property.name: messageText
property.value: in the degree program list for audit.

property.name: messageText
property.value: Stay on top of your required credits and courses. DARS will compare your academic record with program requirements so that you know what's needed to complete your degree.

property.name: messageText
property.value: Select your program from the menu above & run DARS to see your academic progress now.

property.name: messageText
property.value: Still deciding on a degree program? DARS can help you determine your academic progress towards any degree.

property.name: messageText
property.value: Select a program from the menu above and run DARS to explore listed majors and more.

property.name: messageText
property.value: How to Use Plan Audit for Academic Planning

property.name: messageText
property.value: Wondering if your plan will meet your program requirements?

property.name: messageText
property.value: This plan review compares your academic record and planned courses with program requirements to give you a general idea of what will be needed to complete your degree.

property.name: messageText
property.value: Make sure that you have added courses to your plan for future quarters, then select your program from the menu above and run a Plan Audit to determine if you are on the right track with your plan.

property.name: messageText
property.value: This review is meant as a planning tool, and is not an official evaluation of academic progress. Work with your adviser to ensure that your planned courses will meet your degree or program requirements. Final confirmation of degree requirements will be subject to department or college and university approval.

bean.p:messageText: You have no planned courses available for review. [0] and add them to your plan.

property.name: messageText
property.value: One or more of your planned courses requires additional information. In order to run this plan review, MyPlan needs more details for the following course(s):

bean.p:replacement: We are unable to generate a plan review because the courses you have planned do not appear in the published Time Schedule(s).

bean.p:messageText: The following courses in your plan will not be included in your review because they are not listed in the current Time Schedule(s). [0]
